question: Question
create_survey_tips: Note: You can add more options by clicking the + button. You can remove an option by clicking the - button. You can select the correct answer by clicking the checkbox

text_answer: Type your answer in the space provided.
fill_all_fields: Please fill out all the fields
thank_you: Thank you for participating in our survey!
survey_finished_message: You have successfully completed the survey and your answers have been submitted.

choose_survey_type: Please Select Your Desired Purpose: Would You Like to Create a Survey or a Test?
read_rules: Please read the following rules carefully before starting the test.
single_choice_rule: For single choice questions, you can only select one answer.
multiple_choice_rule: For multiple choice questions, select at least two answers or more as you see fit.
text_question_rule: For text questions, type your answer in the space provided. The correctness of your answer will be checked by the admin.
hint_for_survey: Hint: You can only participate in the survey once. Please make sure you have a stable internet connection before starting the survey and ensure all questions are answered to the best of your ability.
time_limit_text_1: This survey is timed. You have
time_limit_text_2: seconds per question. Unanswered questions will not be counted.
question_empty_warning: Please ensure all questions are filled out. Empty questions cannot be submitted.
single_choice_validation_warning: For single-choice questions, please select the correct answer.
multiple_choice_validation_warning: For multiple-choice questions, please select at least two correct answers.
text_answer_validation_warning: For text answer questions, please provide an answer.
thank_you_participation: Thank you for participating in our Test!
search_survey_or_test_not_found: Sorry, no survey or test found matching your search criteria. Please try again with different keywords or filters.
no_test_surveys_yet: No surveys or tests have been added yet.
delete_account_warning: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This cannot be undone.
